shutter.translation[0].definitions[0].de: one of a pair of wooden or metal covers on the outside of a window that can be closed to keep light out or prevent thieves from coming in
shutter.translation[0].definitions[1].de: a part of a camera that opens for a very short time to let light onto the film
shutter.translation[1].definitions[0].de: to close a business, office etc for a short time or permanently
shutter.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: The company shuttered its Hong Kong business a year ago.
